channel.title: Posts on josaphat.co
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on josaphat.co

item.title: This Website
item.description: The first and most logical thing I have to talk about is this website. Bear with it if some things aren’t perfect; it’s still a work-in-progress, but I’ve waited until it at least got to a presentable point before publishing it. If you’re on the latest Chrome or Firefox, these pages should already look mostly complete (the footer being the only thing in need of some polish). If you’re viewing the site on elinks, w3m, and probably other text-only web browsers, then the state of the site ought to be indistinguishable from complete.

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is my first(ish) blog post. I’ve had other blogs in the past (hosted on blogger), but they’ve never stuck because their focus has always been wrong. At one point I did a blog that was a catalog of things I thought were interesting in my life. I did one with a political focus; that lasted for a couple of months. One was about song writing. As I write this, I still have a first blog post about how I was going to share my journey through designing a game and it has over 200 views (sorry to whoever saw that, became excited, and never got a second post).
